description: Award-winning radio fresh from the winners-circle to your computer. From the Peabody Awards, to the Prix Italia to the New York Festivals - every mp3 is a champ.
title: And the Winner Is...

description:
Les Années lumière vous invitent à un fabuleux voyage hebdomadaire au pays de l'astronomie, de la biologie, de la chimie, de l'environnement, de l'exploration spatiale, de la génétique, du génie, de l'histoire, de la philosophie des sciences et bien d'autres... 
      Fréquence de publication : Hebdomadaire

title: Les années lumière

description: Listening to As It Happens is like taking a trip around the world. From the complex headlines of the day to the weird and wacky, As It Happens brings you the story behind the story.
title: As It Happens

description: Every week, Spark producer and technology columnist Anshuman Iddamsetty examines the larger stories behind our ever-evolving digital landscape.
title: Bandwidth

description:
The At Issue political panel is back! Chantal Hé bert, Andrew Coyne and Allan Gregg, along with Dan Leger, assess how the federal party leaders fared over the summer, and where they stand heading into a delayed fall session of Parliament. 
Peter Mansbridge hosts the country's most-watched political panel, with
Chantal Hébert, Andrew Coyne and Allan Gregg debating the week's hot
topics on Parliament Hill. Plus, feature interviews with political
leaders and newsmakers.
title: CBC News: At Issue (Video)

description:
The At Issue political panel is back! Chantal Hé bert, Andrew Coyne and Allan Gregg, along with Dan Leger, assess how the federal party leaders fared over the summer, and where they stand heading into a delayed fall session of Parliament. 
Peter Mansbridge hosts the country's most-watched political panel, with
Chantal Hébert, Andrew Coyne and Allan Gregg debating the week's hot
topics on Parliament Hill. Plus, feature interviews with political
leaders and newsmakers.
title: CBC News: At Issue  (Audio)

description: The latest News - National and International, updated every hour.
title: CBC News: Hourly Edition

description: Tune in for a wrap-up of world and national events from a team of national reporters and foreign correspondents, hosted by Alison Smith.
title: CBC News: The World at Six

description: The World This Hour keeps you up to date with what's happening in Canada and around the world.
title: CBC News: The World This Hour

description: World Report is news that has broken overnight with a look ahead to the day's expected events. The program features the latest international news, as well as the top domestic stories. It is also an outlet for CBC journalists to break original stories.
title: CBC News: World Report

description: The World This Weekend is a half-hour news and information program. It wraps up the day's events on Saturdays and Sundays, bringing Canadians the latest developments on the stories of the day at home and around the world.
title: The World This Weekend

description: C'est la vie gives listeners a window into the life of French-speaking Canadians through interviews with people in the news and documentaries from across the country.
title: C'est la vie

description: The Current is a meeting place of perspectives with a fresh take on issues that affect Canadians today.
title: The Current

description: Dispatches host Rick MacInnes-Rae knows what it is like to be an eyewitness to history. Go beyond the headlines with correspondents on assignment all over the globe.
title: Dispatches

description:
Euromag regroupe des moments marquants tirés des émissions diffusées sur les ondes des Radios francophones publiques : Radio France, Radio Suisse romande et RTBF (Belgique). 
      Fréquence de publication : Hebdomadaire

description: Go behind the scenes in the world of Canadian politics with host Evan Solomon and CBC reporters in the Parliamentary Bureau and across the country.
title: The House

description: Ideas is all about ideas - programs that explore everything from culture and the arts to science, technology and social issues.
title: The Best of Ideas

description:
CBC News' Chief Correspondent Peter Mansbridge hosts The National On Demand weekdays at 6:00 p.m. ET.  It's a unique and dynamic digest of the day's top stories for people who are on the go and online, and a preview of what's coming up on The National.

title: The National On Demand

description:
Écoutez les dernières nouvelles nationales et internationales.

description: Get daily access to the movers and shakers when Evan Solomon interviews the country's most influential figures. From politicians to writers to leaders from all parts of the country.
title: Power & Politics

description:
Quirks & Quarks covers the science and technology beat. Every week, the program presents the people behind the latest discoveries in the physical and natural sciences - from the smallest sub-atomic particle to the largest objects in the sky and everything in between.
 
      Click here to subscribe to their entire show:
       <span class="pd_upd">
title: Quirks & Quarks

description: Quirks & Quarks is also available in segments: Saturdays from July to September, 2010.  RSS    Subscribe in iTunes   Download the latest mp3
title: Quirks & Quarks - Segments

description: It's all our best Radio One archive material!
title: Rewind

description: From politics to pop culture, Rex Murphy brings a unique and always controversial perspective to the news. This season, he'll also be checking in on what Canadians are saying about the stories that matter to them.
title: Rex Murphy (Audio)

description: From politics to pop culture, Rex Murphy brings a unique and always controversial perspective to the news. This season, he'll also be checking in on what Canadians are saying about the stories that matter to them.
title: Rex Murphy (Video)

description: Spark on CBC Radio One Nora Young helps you navigate your digital life by connecting you to fresh ideas in surprising ways.
title: Spark

description: Spark Plus features additional audio you won't hear on the regular Spark podcast, including extended interviews and bonus material.
title: Spark Plus

description: A podcast of the best of this lively program with host Michael Enright who tackles everything from politics to pop culture, in Canada and around the world.
title: The Best of The Sunday Edition

description: Tapestry explores spirituality, religion and the search for meaning. Find space for your soul every week.
title: Tapestry

description: Trailbreakers is an exciting and eye-opening new series. Trailbreakers profiles Aboriginal people who are blazing a new path forward and shaking up conventional wisdom about themselves and issues by getting up close and personal.
title: Trailbreakers

description: Type A is a series that celebrates strong personalities who are not afraid to speak their minds. Hosts Rod Love and Karin Klassen define their starting point as this: if you take care of the economy - everything else will take care of itself.
title: Type A

description: Dr. Brian Goldman takes listeners through the swinging doors of hospitals and doctors' offices, behind the curtain where the gurney lies.
title: White Coat, Black Art

description: CBC Radio's alberta@noon, with host Donna McElligott, connects urban and rural Albertans by exploring the environmental, agricultural, educational and political issues affecting everyone from the far north to the deep south of the province.
title: alberta@noon

description: Jo-Ann Roberts explores the stories that make a difference in your daily life. The show brings together inquiring minds from the North Coast to the Peace, down to the Southern Interior and over to Vancouver Island.
title: BC: All Points West

description: Host Mark Forsythe connects British Columbians as they share stories and ideas about what they have in common and what makes them different.
title: B.C. Almanac

description: Once a week, Earlier host Lee Rosevere features a new discovery or classic favourite Canadian artist from his personal playlist.
title: B.C. Earlier

description: The Early Edition Podcast features the top story of the day from The Early Edition with Rick Cluff. Expect to hear highlights from the show's news, health, civic affairs, cultural and community coverage.
title: BC: The Early Edition

description: On The Coast is a great way to catch up on the day's news, and get connected to what's happening in your neighbourhood every weekday, and you'll be right up to date on all the latest sports, weather, traffic, and entertainment from around the Lower Mainland.
title: BC: On The Coast

description: On The Island is a lively and informative blend of news, reviews and interviews, designed to keep Victorians informed about the issues that matter to them.
title: BC: On The Island

description: Radio West is B.C.'s newest afternoon show. Host Rebecca Zandbergen meets the people behind the news in B.C.'s Interior, and gives listeners a chance to share their stories too.
title: BC: Radio West

description: Whether you spend your mornings in your kitchen, your car or your office, tune in to the Calgary Eyeopener for the information you need to stay in touch with your city.
title: Calgary: Eyeopener

description: Designed to ease Calgary commuters' transitions from the end of the workday back to their families, The Homestretch offers an entertaining and lively blend of news and information.
title: Calgary: The Homestretch

description: By speaking every week with experienced skiers, snowboarders and avalanche experts, Paul Karchut finds out exactly what the snow is like at the resorts and in the backcountry of southern Alberta and Eastern British Columbia.
title: Calgary: The Real Ski Report

description: Information Morning Cape Breton helps listeners better understand and explore the challenges in our island's future, remember their past and celebrate their neighbours' accomplishments.
title: Cape Breton: Info. Morning

description: CBC Radio Calgary's Daybreak Alberta helps you find out what Albertans are up to when they leave the workweek behind. Host Russell Bowers connects Albertans with one another with news and stories from across the province.
title: Daybreak Alberta

description: Join the Daybreak crew every weekday for the best in-depth coverage of local, national and international news.
title: Daybreak Montreal

description: Join Lydia Neufeld and Rick Harp weekdays on Edmonton AM for an in-depth look at the day's top stories. When Edmontonians tune in to Edmonton AM, they'll get the information they need to get ready for a day in their city.
title: Edmonton AM

description: Radio Active brings you an eye opening, entertaining slice of Edmonton life. We'll update you on the latest news of the day, take you to what's going on right now and what's happening on weeknights. We'll let you know what you should know about your community.
title: Edmonton: Radio Active

description: Manitobans start their day off right with Information Radio. Join us for a variety of stories and items, including news, sports, traffic, business, comedy and more.
title: MB: Information Radio

description: DOWNLOAD is a new kind of program designed for the Maritimes. Think of it as a new television channel devoted to broadcasting comedy, drama, music and information programs all made in the Maritimes.
title: Maritimes: Download

description: Information Morning Fredericton is your daily survival guide. We bring you the top stories from the city, the province - and around the world. We run the stories that matter to you.
title: NB: Info. Morning (Fred.)

description:
The weekly online New Brunswick political panel, hosted by Terry Seguin.
  <span class="pd_upd">
title: NB: The Political Panel

description:
Shift is an energetic two and a half hours that connects people in the province with the events of the day and with each other.
  <span class="pd_upd">
title: NB: Shift

description:
Spin Reduxit is CBC New Brunswick's political blog. CBC reporters Jacques Poitras and Daniel McHardie analyze the latest in New Brunswick politics and decode the spin emanating out of the provincial legislature.
  <span class="pd_upd">
title: NB: Spin Reduxit

description: Join host Leigh Anne Power in Gander on the Central Newfoundland Morning Show. The show provides news along with current affairs items and stories of local interest from urban areas and the diverse rural communities surrounding the two towns.
title: NL: Central Morning Show

description: Since going on the air in 1951, "The Broadcast," as it is affectionately known, has been dedicated to covering stories about the fishing industry, reflecting the people and the communities that depend on the sea for their livelihood.
title: NL: Fisheries Broadcast

description: Hosted by Cindy Wall and Tony Dawson, the program keeps people informed about what's happening around them. Labradorians hear about it first on Labrador Morning.
title: NL: Labrador Morning

description: A live political call-in show, focusing on one provocative question about the political news of the day/week.
title: NL: On Point Radio

description: On The Go has now been on the air for 30 years, bringing Newfoundlanders and Labradorians stories from every nook, cranny and cove in the province.
title: NL: On The Go

description: Join host Ramona Dearing for entertainment and information on Radio Noon. The program features Radio Noon Crosstalk, a phone-in segment with special guests. There is always a range of topics, from lifestyles to political and social issues.
title: NL: Radio Noon

description: While you've been sleeping, the world has changed.  The Morning Show tells you how. We bring you the latest news; the stories that matter most, and the information you need.
title: NL: St. John's Morning

description: The North This Week features the best stories from the past seven days from Whitehorse to Yellowknife to Iqaluit. Expect to hear all kinds of great features from shows like A New Day and The Trailbreaker and many others.
title: The North This Week

description: Information Morning kick starts the day on mainland Nova Scotia with news, survival information, compelling stories and opinions from all perspectives in the province.
title: NS: Information Morning

description: A lively and entertaining blend of national and regional news, interviews, book reviews and recipes, Mainstreet is designed to put Nova Scotia listeners back in touch with their communities at the end of the workday.
title: NS: Mainstreet Halifax

description: Ontario Morning tells you what's happening in your world - whether it's down the road or around the globe.Get the latest national and international news on World Report and local newscasts on the half-hour.
title: Ontario Morning

description: Host Rita Celli invites listeners to get together for a province-wide conversation about the stories that affect you.
title: Ontario Today

description: All In A Day is Ottawa's number one afternoon drive program. Alan Neal and the All In A Day team offer compelling local stories, as well as regional, national and international reports.
title: Ottawa All In A Day

description:
CBC Radio's Island Morning is a news and current affairs source for Prince Edward Island. Host Matt Rainnie and morning news editor Mitch Cormier talk about the issues that matter to islanders. 
    Highlights updated weekdays.

title: PEI: Island Morning

description: Every weekday, The Morning Edition examines urban and rural issues from across Saskatchewan.

description: Morning North is a weekday news and current affairs program hosted by Markus Schwabe.
title: Sudbury: Morning North

description: Metro Morning with Matt Galloway keeps listeners informed about what's going on in Toronto and offers listeners an optimistic, sometimes humorous view of the world, together with the day's more serious news.

description: Bande à part vous propose chaque semaine une sélection musicale à télécharger, ponctuée par de courts extraits de conversations avec des mélomanes ou des artisans. Fréquence de publication : Hebdomadaire  RSS    Abonnez-vous dans iTunes   Download the latest mp3

description: If a joke's worth telling, it's worth repeating. The Comedy Factory collects our favourite skits, commentaries and funny bits that appeared on CBC Radio over the past week. It's an assembly line of humour, safety-tested and priced to move!
title: Comedy Factory

description: If you have iTunes or an iPod, you can now download and experience the Definitely Not the Opera enhanced podcast, complete with chapters, photos and links! The enhanced podcast format makes it easier for you to navigate through our weekly collection of highlights. It's like an audio slideshow on your iPod!
title: DNTO: Enhanced

description: CBC Radio Film Reviewer Eli Glasner shares his big screen thoughts on the latest and greatest movies appearing at theatre near you.  Some cinema smarts (and snark) to go with your popcorn.
title: Eli Glasner on Film

description: A weekly romp of original, biting, ridiculous, outrageous and ultimately hilarious sketch comedy from a crack team in Edmonton.
title: The Irrelevant Show

description: CBC Radio's Laugh Out Loud presents a new, quick joke for you every day with the Laugh of the Day podcast! Currently on hiatus. Archive episodes available until June 2011.  RSS    Subscribe in iTunes   Download the latest mp3
title: Laugh of the Day

description: Shelagh Rogers travels the country, conversing with authors and readers of all kinds.
title: The Next Chapter

description: QTV is the televised version of CBC Radio One's Q with Jian Ghomeshi, which also airs on CBC's bold tv.  Featuring full length interviews with celebrities and personalities in the worlds of arts, culture and entertainment.  The video podcast brings you the best interviews for you to download and watch.  Check it out.
title: Q: The Video Podcast

description: Ab-Originals is a weekly podcast of the hottest Aboriginal music in Canada. Four of the best-known musical hosts in Indian Country will bring you live concerts, urban and hip-hop music, top 10 chart artists, and all the rest of it in their musical podlatch.
title: CBC Radio 3 Ab-Originals

description: Saturday Night Blues has been CBC's flagship program of great blues, swing, boogie, gospel and roots music since 1986. Holger Petersen is at the helm. Subscribe to the podcast to download our exclusive interviews.
title: Saturday Night Blues

description: A podcast of the best of this lively program with host Michael Enright who tackles everything from politics to pop culture, in Canada and around the world.

description: Up-close and intimate performances by some of Canada's best musicians, recorded live off the CBC studio floor.

description: The stories and misadventures of Dave, the owner of the "Vinyl Cafe", the world's smallest record store, where the motto is "We may not be big, but we're small."

description: Enter the world of Jonathan Goldstein. You wouldn't want to live there, but it's a hell of a place to visit.
